reqs:
Pre-reqs: All of COMM 290, COMM 293 and one of COMM 295, ECON 201, ECON 301.
Equivalents: COEC 298
description: Introduces the basic principles of financial valuation, including the time-value of money and the risk/return tradeoff. Develops tools for the quantitative analysis of corporate and/or individual financing and saving decisions, and of capital budgeting decisions. Credit will be granted for only one of COMM 298 or COEC 298.
